org.apache.drill.test

Class QueryBuilder.PlanMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.drill.test.QueryBuilder.PlanMatcher
  • Enclosing class:
    QueryBuilder

    public static class QueryBuilder.PlanMatcher
extends Object
    Collects expected and non-expected query patterns. Upon match() method call, matches given patterns to the query plan.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlanMatcher(String plan)

      Checks if stored patterns (string parts) are included or excluded in the given plan.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • include

        public QueryBuilder.PlanMatcher include(String... patterns)

      • exclude

        public QueryBuilder.PlanMatcher exclude(String... patterns)

      • match

        public void match()
        Checks if stored patterns (string parts) are included or excluded in the given plan.

        Example:
        For the plan: 

         00-00    Screen
 00-01      Project(cnt=[$0])
 00-02        DirectScan(groupscan=[selectionRoot = classpath:/tpch/nation.parquet,
 numFiles = 1, usedMetadataSummaryFile = false, DynamicPojoRecordReader{records = [[25]]}])
        • To check that number of files are 1 and DynamicPojoRecordReader is used: planMatcher.include("numFiles = 1", "DynamicPojoRecordReader")
        • To check that metadata summary file was not used: planMatcher.exclude("usedMetadataSummaryFile = true")
        Calling planMatcher.match() method would check that given patterns are present or absent in the given plan. Method execution will fail with AssertionError only if expected pattern was not matched or unexpected pattern was matched.
